column4: hi, i have a laptop without cd drive, with ubuntu 6 i downloaded the ubuntu 8.04 but i want to do a fresh complet reinstall is there a way to make the iso on a usb stick so i can do the installation via usb stick else of a cd-rom ?

hi, i have a laptop without cd drive, with ubuntu 6 i downloaded the ubuntu 8.04 but i want to do a fresh complet reinstall is there a way to make the iso on a usb stick so i can do the installation via usb stick else of a cd-rom ?
I don't know about usb, but I know another way without cd if you have a good network connection
